alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 02 at 3:39AM MST until December 02 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts of 60 mph or more expected. * WHERE...Portions of east central and northeast Colorado, northwest and west central Kansas and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 5 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will move loose debris, damage property including Christmas decorations and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing dust and perhaps a wall of dust is expected reducing visibilities and making travel hazardous if not dangerous at times.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County
